press_area.description: Surface area of the press in mm^2.

press_s.description: Some displacement or distance parameter for pressing.

pull_tensile_strength.description: Tensile strength during the pull process.

pull_area.description: Area involved in the pull process.

pull_s.description: Some displacement or distance parameter for pulling.

T_sky.description: Sky temperature in °C; if unknown, the ambient temperature is used.

epsilon.description: Emission factor for thermal radiation (float between 0.0 and 1.0).

eta_el.description: Efficiency of heating elements (float between 0.0 and 1.0).
